00011 // standard include files
00012 #include <stdio.h>
00013 #include <stdlib.h>
00014 
00015 // project include files
00016 #include "common.h"
00017 #include "cluster.h"
00018 #include "kmeans.h"

00025 void Cluster :: cluster ()
00026 {
00027     double **X, **mean;
00028     bool **responsibility;
00029     FILE *tab1Fp, *tab2Fp, *tab3Fp;
00030     long n, d, k, N, D, K, recordSize;
00031     Kmeans k1;
00032 
00033     if (!(tab1Fp = fopen (_TABLE1NAME, "rb")))
00034     {
00035         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE1NAME);
00036         exit (0);
00037     }
00038 
00039     if (!(tab2Fp = fopen (_TABLE2NAME, "wb")))
00040     {
00041         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE2NAME);
00042         exit (0);
00043     }
00044 
00045     if (!(tab3Fp = fopen (_TABLE3NAME, "wb")))
00046     {
00047         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE3NAME);
00048         exit (0);
00049     }
00050 
00051     // determine parameters
00052     fseek (tab1Fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00053     recordSize = (long)_TAB1RECORDSIZE;
00054     N = (ftell (tab1Fp)) / recordSize;
00055 
00056     K = (long) sqrt ((double)N);
00057 
00058     D = _CEPSTRALCOEFS;
00059 
00060     // allocate space for N data points with dimention D
00061     X = (double **) calloc (N, sizeof (double *));
00062     for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00063         X [n] = (double *) calloc (D, sizeof (double));
00064 
00065     // allocate space for K means with dimention D
00066     mean = (double **) calloc (K, sizeof (double *));
00067     for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00068         mean [k] = (double *) calloc (D, sizeof (double));
00069 
00070     // allocate space for the responsibility matrix N X K
00071     responsibility = (bool **) calloc (N, sizeof (bool *));
00072     for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00073         responsibility [n] = (bool *) calloc (K, sizeof (bool));
00074 
00075     // read data points in X
00076     for (n = 0; n < N; n++)
00077     {
00078         fseek (tab1Fp, n * recordSize, SEEK_SET);
00079         fread (X [n], sizeof (real), D, tab1Fp);
00080     }
00081 
00082     // perform K means clustering
00083     k1.KmeansCalculate(X, mean, responsibility, N, D, K);
00084 
00085     // write the means in table 2
00086     for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00087     {
00088         fwrite (mean [k], sizeof (real), D, tab2Fp);
00089     }
00090 
00091     // write the responsibility matrix in table 3
00092     for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00093     {
00094         for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00095         {
00096             if (responsibility [n][k] == true)
00097             {
00098                 fwrite (&k, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00099                 fwrite (&n, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     fclose (tab1Fp);
00105     fclose (tab2Fp);
00106     fclose (tab3Fp);
00107 } // end of cluster
